alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 9:36AM CDT until May 09 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN PHILLIPS...WESTERN FRANKLIN AND HARLAN COUNTIES... At 936 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Atlanta to near Alma to near Almena, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Alma, Orleans and Woodruff around 940 AM CDT. Huntley and Ragan around 950 AM CDT. Republican City and Harlan County Dam around 955 AM CDT. Naponee around 1005 AM CDT. Hildreth and Bloomington around 1015 AM CDT. Upland around 1030 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
